response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is significantly lower than its market value. We trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to discuss the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
